tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE misinformation_tracking (
  post_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  post_content TEXT,
  interaction_type VARCHAR(50),
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE misinformation (
  post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  post_content TEXT,
  misinformation_category VARCHAR(50),
  misinformation_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES user_interactions(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE MisinformationPosts (
    post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    post_content TEXT,
    user_id INT,
    post_date TIMESTAMP,
    misinformation_score FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE MisinformationReports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    post_id INT,
    reporter_id INT,
    report_date TIMESTAMP,
    report_reason TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE posts (
    post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    post_content TEXT,
    post_date TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE reactions (
    reaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    post_id INT NOT NULL,
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    reaction_type VARCHAR(10),
    reaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (post_id) REFERENCES posts(post_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE comments (
    comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    post_id INT NOT NULL,
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    comment_content TEXT,
    comment_date TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (post_id) REFERENCES posts(post_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE MisinformationComments (
  comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  post_id INT,
  comment_content TEXT NOT NULL,
  comment_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);
